medical_history.chief_complaint: Periumbilical abdominal pain evolving into right lower quadrant pain with nausea and non-bilious non-bloody emesis.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Symptoms started 1 day prior to presentation, initially as periumbilical abdominal pain, which progressed to right lower quadrant pain along with nausea and non-bilious non-bloody emesis.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Past Medical History: None. Past Surgical History: Left orchiectomy for testicular torsion.
